text: 4.3: Stt 9.3; Ro 14.6; 1 Ko 8.8; 10.30-31; Kor 2.20-21; Hi 13.4Mba gumgi, mbe mani gu muuiŋ warir rɨgɨrgen guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi thɨvav, mbe vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme nza ana khothɨgav, ana buna guareŋ kaŋgi gumgi gu mbigi, ana nza mbɨrgeŋ nzuav muuŋgi mba, mbe ntan mbɨrganen mbe thɨvi. Mba mba nza ntan mbɨv, nta suaŋv Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨ suaŋv ana ndikndigɨrga.
